full_text: Page 852 Re: Epstein, Jeffrey 76318-054 From Charisma Edge To [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] Date 2019/11/06 12:38 Subject: Re: Epstein, Jeffrey 76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm Good Morning [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] The guidance provided indicates this is an active and on-going investigation and as such the institution has not prepared a report for release on behalf of the BOP. You may be able to submit a request directly to the bureau's Headquarters (Central Office) or to OIG and the FBI, who are involved in this matter. The contact information for the Office of General Counsel is: BOP-OGC/Assistant Director~@bop.gov 202-307-3062 Freedom of Information Act/Privacy Act Section Office of General Counsel, Room 936 Federal Bureau of Prisons 320 First Street, N.W. Washington, D.C. 20534 Email: OGC_EFOIA@BOP.GOV >>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] (USMS) [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @usdoj.gov> 11/5/2019 7:10 PM >>> 10.4. Thanks On Nov 5, 2019, at 7:07 PM, Charisma Edge [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> wrote: Hi [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] I have forwarded your request to the legal department for a response. I'll get back to you in the morning. Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @usdoj.gov Page 1567 DOJ-OGR-00025162

text_blocks.content: Re: Epstein, Jeffrey 76318-054 From Charisma Edge To [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] Date 2019/11/06 12:38 Subject: Re: Epstein, Jeffrey 76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm

Good Morning [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] The guidance provided indicates this is an active and on-going investigation and as such the institution has not prepared a report for release on behalf of the BOP. You may be able to submit a request directly to the bureau's Headquarters (Central Office) or to OIG and the FBI, who are involved in this matter.

The contact information for the Office of General Counsel is: BOP-OGC/Assistant Director~@bop.gov 202-307-3062 Freedom of Information Act/Privacy Act Section Office of General Counsel, Room 936 Federal Bureau of Prisons 320 First Street, N.W. Washington, D.C. 20534 Email: OGC_EFOIA@BOP.GOV

On Nov 5, 2019, at 7:07 PM, Charisma Edge [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> wrote: Hi [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] I have forwarded your request to the legal department for a response. I'll get back to you in the morning.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @usdoj.gov

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain with redactions. The email discusses an ongoing investigation related to Jeffrey Epstein and provides contact information for the Office of General Counsel.
